channel.title: CVE Feed for niteo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for niteo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-2159|2024-08-02T06:12:20.613Z -- niteo -- cmp%20%E2%80%93%20coming%20soon%20%26%20maintenance%20plugin%20by%20niteothemes
item.description: The CMP – Coming Soon & Maintenance plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Maintenance Mode Bypass in versions up to, and including, 4.1.7. A correct cmp_bypass GET parameter in the URL (equal to the md5-hashed home_url in the default setting) allows users to visit a site placed in maintenance mode thus bypassing the plugin's provided feature.

item.title: CVE-2023-1263|2024-08-02T05:40:59.847Z -- niteo -- cmp%20%E2%80%93%20coming%20soon%20%26%20maintenance%20plugin%20by%20niteothemes
item.description: The CMP – Coming Soon & Maintenance plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure in versions up to, and including, 4.1.6 via the cmp_get_post_detail function. This can allow unauthenticated individuals to obtain the contents of any non-password-protected, published post or page even when maintenance mode is enabled.
